import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import FileBase from 'react-file-base64' import moment from 'moment' import { getBlogs, createBlog, updateBlog, deleteBlog, likeBlog } from '../actions/blogs' const Blogs = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState(null) const dispatch = useDispatch() const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')) const blogs = useSelector((state) => state.blogs) const editBlog = useSelector((state) => currentId ? state.blogs.find((e) => e._id === currentId) : null) const [blogData, setBlogData] = useState({ title : '', message : '', tags : '', selectedFile: '' }) useEffect(() => { if(editBlog) setBlogData(editBlog) },[editBlog]) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getBlogs()) }, [dispatch]) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(currentId){ dispatch(updateBlog(currentId, {...blogData, name: user?.result?.name})) } else { dispatch(createBlog({...blogData, name: user?.result?.name})) } clear() } const clear = () => { setCurrentId(null) setBlogData({ title : '', message : '', tags : '', selectedFile: '' }) } if(!user?.result?.name) { return(
Please Sign In To continue
) } return( !blogs.length === 0 ?
There is no blog

  2. Blogs = {blogs.length}
{currentId ? 'EDIT PREVIOUS ' : 'CREATE A NEW '} Blog
setBlogData({...blogData, title: e.target.value})} />
setBlogData({...blogData, tags: e.target.value.split(',')})} />
setBlogData({...blogData, selectedFile:base64})} />

{blog.title}
{blog.name}
Published on :{blog.createdAt} {moment(blog.createdAt).fromNow()}

{blog.message}

{blog.tags ? blog.tags.map((tag) => `#${tag} `) : 'No Tags'}

{(user?.result?.googleId === blog?.creator || user?.result?._id === blog?.creator) && ( // )} {(user?.result?.googleId === blog?.creator || user?.result?._id === blog?.creator) && ( )}

) )}
